name: Lurking In The Dungeon
description:
Game Description

You don't know why or how, but you've woken up trapped inside an ancient, abandoned dungeon - with nowhere to run.

You thought you heard someone, so you got curious - just to discover it wasn't human. Use the equipment you stumble across on your way to escape this evil force inside this cursed dungeon.

It's up to you now - do you want to live, or do you want to die?
